<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Visit the dominator subtree rooted at Node in pre-order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If TLSBaseAddrReg is non-null, then use that to replace any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TLS&#95;LDCALL instructions. Otherwise, create the register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when the first such instruction is seen, and then use it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as we encounter more instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SystemZLDCleanup::VisitNode(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a94b65b831ad8756f7d3a029a1e599f75">MachineDomTreeNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>,</span></CodeLine>
